attributes.action: acknowledge in the same way as the US Presidency and Government ANY damage done to ALL UK nuclear test veterans and their families by awarding compensation and all the medical support needed in an honest and straightforward manner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to bring attention to the plight of sick and disabled servicemen and women and their families who, since exposure to nuclear testing at various sites including Christmas Island and Maralinga have developed rare and unusual cancers and other illnesses, which have not been considered in the light of their exposure to such testing. Also to bring attention to the fact that the US has accepted responsibility for the effects of nuclear testing on veterans, while officials in the UK drag their feet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
